We are a tech startup, based in the education sector, and are committed to developing a (web-based / software) solution to improve the quality of communication between schools and parents.

Our aim is to provide a system whereby all information is transmitted in a clear, effective and timely manner.

We have prepared a short 3 minute survey and would greatly appreciate any feedback.

Thank you in advance for your availability and kindness.
